Name: Junkyard Wars
Descriptions: Turn Trash into Cash. Rummage through the scrap and turn it into a properly working mechanism, Iron Man Style.
Rules: The size of the team is restricted to 5 members
Plagiarism will be an immediate red card
This is not a branch specific event. Students from all the branches are welcome to take part in Junkyard Wars
The materials and facilities to be used will be provided by the organizer. You are to stick with these and only these materials for the sake of the event
The clock is ticking. Be aware of the clock
Clarify all the doubts you have with the event manager in order to avoid hurdles during the event
Keep your foot in one boat. Don't be a member of more than one team
The organizers will not be held responsible for any late, lost or misdirected entries
All students with a valid identity card from their respective educational institution and a valid DYUKSHA ID are eligible to participate in the event
Decision of organizers will be ﬁnal and binding on all
The organizers have full rights to call off the event if the required number of entries are not met, if that is the case the registered participants will be informed at th, earliest
Change in rules, if any will be highlighted on the website and notiﬁed to the registered teams
